alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Lancaster; Mathews; Middlesex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued October 02 at 4:03PM EDT until October 04 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 8 PM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...One to three feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Lancaster, Gloucester, Middlesex and Mathews Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM Monday to 8 PM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Severe flooding will cause extensive inundation and flooding of numerous roads and buildings resulting in a significant threat to property and life. Water will be 2 to 3 feet or more above ground level in some areas. Severe flooding will extend inland from the waterfront and shoreline flooding homes, businesses and isolating some neighborhoods. Numerous roads will be impassable under several feet of water and cars submerged. Some areas may need to be evacuated. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. WINDMILL POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.0 FT, MODERATE 3.5 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.1 FT, MAJOR 2.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/05 PM 3.2 1.8 1.5 1 MINOR 03/05 AM 3.2 1.8 1.9 1 MINOR 03/06 PM 3.9 2.5 2.2 1 MODERATE 04/06 AM 3.7 2.3 2.3 1 MODERATE 04/07 PM 3.5 2.1 1.8 1 MODERATE 05/07 AM 3.0 1.6 1.6 1 MINOR WARE RIVER AT SCHLEY VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/03 PM 4.3 1.6 1.8 1 NONE 03/04 AM 5.0 2.3 3.0 1 MINOR 03/04 PM 5.8 3.1 3.3 1 MODERATE 04/05 AM 5.3 2.6 3.3 1 MINOR 04/05 PM 5.2 2.5 2.7 1 MINOR 05/06 AM 4.5 1.8 2.4 1 MINOR YORKTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 2.4 FT, MAJOR 2.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/03 PM 4.0 1.4 1.0 1-2 NONE 03/03 AM 5.1 2.5 2.8 2-3 MODERATE 03/03 PM 5.9 3.3 3.2 2 MAJOR 04/04 AM 5.4 2.8 3.1 1 MODERATE 04/05 PM 5.4 2.8 2.5 1 MODERATE 05/06 AM 4.7 2.1 2.3 1 MINOR &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
